#Text=UK serial killer Joanne Dennehy jailed for life
#Text=Saturday , March 1 , 2014
#Text=A judge in England yesterday jailed " cruel , calculating , selfish and manipulative serial killer " Joanne Dennehy for life without parole .
#Text=Dennehy murdered three men known to her and then tried to murder two random strangers .
#Text=File photo of the Old Bailey in London , where Joanne Dennehy was sentenced yesterday .
#Text=Image : Nevilley .
#Text=At the Old Bailey in London , Mr Justice Spencer sentenced Dennehy , 31 , previously referred to in court as Joanna , and three accomplices .
#Text=Gary Stretch , 47 , also convicted of the attempted murders , was given a life term and can apply for parole after nineteen years .
#Text=Leslie Layton , 37 , received a fourteen-year term for helping dispose of bodies .
#Text=Robert Moore , 55 , received a three-year sentence for helping Dennehy .
#Text=Joanne Dennehy laughed , talked , and smiled during proceedings but stood silent and emotionless with her eyes closed when the sentence was announced .
#Text=The judge said she had a " sadistic lust for blood " .

column1: #Text=Dennehy had admitted her crimes ; Stretch and Layton went to trial .
#Text=She killed Lukasz Slaboszewski , 31 , in Peterborough after leading him to believe they were lovers ; he texted a friend " life is beautiful " about the supposed relationship .
#Text=Within two weeks she had gone on to kill housemate John Chapman , 56 , and Kevin Lee , 48 .
#Text=All were stabbed in March last year .
#Text=Lee 's body was found dumped in a ditch clad in a black sequinned dress .
#Text=His buttocks were visible .
#Text=Lee and Dennehy had been having an affair .
#Text=She told a psychiatrist " I killed to see how I would feel , to see if I was as cold as I thought I was , then it got moreish . "
#Text=Mr Justice Spencer noted Dennehy held a " strange fascination " to the men in the case .

column1: #Text=Lee 's family said in a statement yesterday " We feel Joanne Dennehy brainwashed Kevin , causing him to make a bad decision , and he has paid for that with his life . "
#Text=Following the Peterborough murders Dennehy made a 140-mile trip to Hereford where she stabbed dog walkers Robin Bereza and John Rogers with a knife within nine minutes of each other .
#Text=Both survived .
#Text=Mr Justice Spencer identified Dennehy as a psychopath with paraphilia sadomasochism , in which sexual pleasure is gained from the suffering of others .
#Text=She wrote him a letter saying she had no remorse for the murders .
#Text=The mother of two joins Myra Hindley and Rose West as the only women to be given whole-life sentences in the UK , in which convicts are told they will never be released .
#Text=The sentencing follows a recent ruling by the court of appeal upholding the legality of whole life terms .
#Text=The four defendants were jailed in Courtroom 2 of the Old Bailey , where on Wednesday Michael Adebolajo also received a whole life term for a terror attack which killed soldier Lee Rigby .
